explains: vt. 过大而不适于；出生；长大成熟而不再

sentences.en: The girl may or may not outgrow her interest in fashion.
sentences.cn: 那个女孩可能会，也可能不会因长大而失去她对时尚的兴趣。

sentences.en: Very often, we do not completely outgrow that infantile notion that our wishes cause things to happen.
sentences.cn: 我们的愿望导致事情发生这样幼稚的想法，我们很多时候并没有成熟到能够摆脱。

sentences.en: As trees outgrow their ideal habitats in the face of climate change, these flying ecosystem engineers could be a big help in replanting trees.
sentences.cn: 当树木面临气候变化而放弃它们的理想栖息地时，这些飞行的生态系统工程师对于重新植树能有巨大的帮助。
